alert.note: Alert for Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 04 at 2:30PM CST until March 06 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Traverse County. In South Dakota, Brown, Marshall, Roberts and Day Counties. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
